programme.title: Criminal Minds
Criminal Minds
Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again.

credits.actor: Joe Mantegna, Shemar Moore, Matthew Gray Gubler, A. J. Cook, Kirsten Vangsness

programme.title: Baby God
Baby God
programme.desc: Directed by Hannah Olson. With Wendi Babst, Quincy Fortier, Brad Gulko, Cathy Holm. For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. Now his secret is out and his children seek the truth about his motives and try to make sense of their own identities.

programme.desc: Directed by Anne Fontaine. With Fabrice Luchini, Gemma Arterton, Jason Flemyng, Isabelle Candelier. Martin, an ex-Parisian well-heeled hipster passionate about Gustave Flaubert who settled into a Norman village as a baker, sees an English couple moving into a small farm nearby. programme.title: Momo e no tegami
Lettre à Momo
programme.desc: Directed by Hiroyuki Okiura. With Karen Miyama, Yuka, Daizaburo Arakawa, Toshiyuki Nishida. Clinging to an unfinished letter written by her recently deceased father, young Momo moves with her mother from bustling Tokyo to the remote Japanese island of Shio. Upon their arrival, she begins to explore her new habitat, meeting local children and learning their routines and customs. However, it's not long before several bizarre occurrences crop up around the previously tranquil island. ...

programme.title: Les randonneurs
Les randonneurs
programme.desc: Directed by Philippe Harel. With Benoît Poelvoorde, Karin Viard, Géraldine Pailhas, Philippe Harel. Parisian friends (two brothers and their one-time girl friends) fly to Corsica for a mountain trek guided by the married lover of one of the women. Cora, nearly 30, goes because her psychic says she'll meet a man with a load on his shoulders, which she guesses is a backpack. Nadine goes to be with her lover, Eric, the trek's guide, who is married but promises to leave his wife and daughters soon....

credits.actor: Benoît Poelvoorde, Karin Viard, Géraldine Pailhas
